name: callbacks.add
title: callbacks.add()
desc: Add a callback or a collection of callbacks to a callback list.

argument.desc: A function, or array of functions, that are to be added to the callback list.
argument.name: callbacks

examples.desc: Use callbacks.add() to add new callbacks to a callback list:

entries.longdesc: This method returns the Callbacks object onto which it is attached (this).
